extendedIngredients.name: cheese cake mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 1/2 oz Cheese Sauce Mix (I used an Alfredo Mix)

extendedIngredients.name: tomatoes
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 15 oz Can Red Gold Diced Tomatoes with Basil, Garlic and Oregano

recipes.title: Beefy Mac and Cheese {Slow Cooker}

winePairing.pairingText: Lambrusco, Chenin Blanc, and Riesling are great choices for Macaroni and Cheese. With rich, cheesy mac & cheese you'll want to cleanse the palate with something crisp and acidic. We recommend Chenin Blanc, Riesling, or dry Lambrusco if you're in the mood for a red. The Molo 8 Lambrusco Mantovano with a 4.3 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 12 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Molo 8 Lambrusco Mantovano
productMatches.description: Intense ruby red. The bouquet is persistent and fragrant with hints of black cherries and wild berries. On the palate the wine is aromatic, fruity and pleasantly sweet.Ideal for cheese, ham, salami, pork or cold cuts and most dishes.

recipes.instructions: Combine beef with remaining ingredients except macaroni and shredded cheese.Cover and cook on low for 6 hours. 30 minutes before you want to serve, stir in cheese and cooked macaroni.Cover and cook until heated through 15-30 minutes.Stir before serving

steps.step: Combine beef with remaining ingredients except macaroni and shredded cheese.Cover and cook on low for 6 hours. 30 minutes before you want to serve, stir in cheese and cooked macaroni.Cover and cook until heated through 15-30 minutes.Stir before serving
